thread.title: KERRVILLE ISD
thread.title_full: Hodges Badge Company, Inc reviewed by KERRVILLE ISD

author: KERRVILLE ISD
title: KERRVILLE ISD
text: Ordered Gold/Bronze/ Silver Medals for our Reader Awards. We were able to insert our own Graphic along with wording. Proofs were sent, order was rushed to ensure due date delivery. Beautiful work, will most certainly use Hodge Badges again!
